attributes.action: ask for it to be made law that only registered enviroment license holder be allowed to attend scrap yards to sell on scrap vehicles and iron
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
we the undersigned believe that a law enforceing the registration of waste carriers throughout england and ireland to be enforced,as the economy is in such a bad state now that it will be affecting all those in this line of work that depend on their income to pay bills that are to be enforced on them ie LEZ COMPLIANCE...
you need a license to drive a car,van.lorry etc so why can it not be enforced the same for scrap vehicles etc???
